name: Pistachio Cake III
author: MACC
summary: A green tube cake made by altering a cake mix with pistachio pudding and green food coloring.
ingredients: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan
In a large bowl mix together cake mix and pudding mix
Make a well in the center and pour in eggs, water, oil, almond extract and green food coloring
Blend ingredients, then beat for 2 minutes at medium speed
Pour into prepared 10 inch tube pan
Bake in the preheated oven for 50 to 55 minutes, or until cake springs back when lightly pressed
Turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely
